name.description: The full name of the candidate.

imageUrl.description: A URL pointing to a photo of the candidate.

groupId.description: The ID of the group this candidate belongs to.

group.title: Group
group.description: A group of candidates for a specific election or position.

name.description: The name of the election group.

description.description: A short description of the election group.

vote.title: Vote
vote.description: A single vote cast by a citizen for a specific group.

nationalId.description: The national ID of the voter.

candidateId.description: The ID of the candidate who received the vote.

candidateName.description: The name of the candidate who received the vote.

groupId.description: The ID of the group in which the vote was cast.

votedAt.description: The timestamp when the vote was cast.

/candidates/{candidateId}.description: Collection of all election candidates across all groups.

/votes/{voteId}.description: Collection where each document represents a single vote. Document ID is a composite of nationalId and groupId.
